snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry stopped short of saying Russia provided the missile unit that downed Malaysia Airlines Flight 17.
abstract: United States Sec of State John Kerry presents detailed case alleging that Russia's funneling heavy weapons to Ukraine and training separatists are likely responsible for downed Malaysian airliner over eastern Ukraine; almost a dozen Ukrainian transport planes, reconnaissance aircraft and helicopters have been shot down by separatists since May 2014, using weapons that Russia is believed to have provided.

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow, and David M. Herszenhorn from Kiev, Ukraine.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry stopped short of saying Russia provided the missile unit that downed Malaysia Airlines Flight 17.

headline.main: Kerry Says Russia Trained Separatists to Use Antiaircraft Missiles
headline.print_headline: Kerry Says Russia Trained Separatists to Use Antiaircraft Missiles
